data.description: parse nmap xml scan information using perl
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is the main parser that can retrieve information from an nmap
    security scan. This module is being used by parts of the security
    community in order to speed up internal development of security
    tools using perl and nmap. This takes the power of nmap information,
    into a perl developer's hands. The nmap security scanner is widely
    used, (as perl) in the security industry and more modules could be
    created (Nmap::*) to be compatible with helping in the development
    in these tools which will benefit various security developers.
    (Nmap::Scanner is an example of an existing Nmap module on CPAN).
